text: Larry Dean Arp (born July 7, 1966) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/136300/larry- arp#.VWveHWTBzGc He represents the 69th district. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:1966 births Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Dean Arp
